cimr: data analysis toolkit using association mappingÂ¶

Date: Aug 21, 2019 Version: 0.1.5

cimr is an open source, BSD-licensed library providing data analysis tool for the Python programming language. cimr primarily utilizes publicly available summary statistics files from genome-wide association study (GWAS), expression quantitative trait loci (eQTL) or other variant-based association mapping results. For contributing new data into cimr-d, see contributions document . cimr also offers some utility functions to process variant-based association summary statistics and to conduct gene-based tests.

Useful links: Source repository | Issues & Ideas
